verbose_text: RUNX1-ETO-AAVS1 targeting vectors comprised a 804-bp 5 ' homology arm, a tetracycline inducible promoter (TRE3G-CMV) driving expression of HA-RUNX1-ETO cDNA sequence, Puromycin N-acetyltransferase resistance cassette with gene expression to be driven by endogenous promoter after genomic insertion, a CAG promoter driving expression of a modified Tet3G reverse tetracycline controlled transactivator (rtTA) and a 837-bp 3 ' homology arm.
evidence: expression of a modified Tet3G reverse tetracycline
